original_text:
Though you search for your enemies,
    you will not find them.
Those who wage war against you
    will be as nothing at all.
korean_text: 네가 찾아도 너와 싸우던 자들을 만나지 못할 것이요 너를 치는 자들은 아무것도 아닌 것 같고 허무한 것 같이 되리니

sentences.original_text: Though you search for your enemies
Those who wage war against you
will be as nothing at all
